H0.text: Muscle is the type that includes skeletal, cardiac, and smooth.

H1.text: Nervous are the category to which skeletal, cardiac, and smooth belong.

H2.text: Epithelial are skeletal, cardiac, and smooth types.

H3.text: Connective is a type of tissue that includes skeletal, cardiac, and smooth.

A4.text: There are three types of muscle tissue in vertebrates: skeletal, cardiac, and smooth.

A5.text: Muscle is a specialised soft tissue, one of the four basic types of animal tissues.
